home.title: ArcticAria
home.subtitle: Your one-stop platform for life, study, and work.
home.summary: Ever feel like life is a mess? Unsure what to do today? Get sidetracked and forget tasks halfway through? ArcticAria was born to solve these problems.

items.title: Clear Your Mind, Focus on the Present
items.desc: Say goodbye to chaotic task lists. Clearly know what project you're working on and what to do next.

items.title: Manage Life, Forget Forgetting
items.desc: Delegate unimportant but necessary recurring chores to our smart reminder system. Stop worrying about paying bills or taking out the trash.

items.title: Find Joy, Balance Life
items.desc: In your spare time, let us help you discover new ways to relax and enjoy the beauty of life.

todos.title: Todos
todos.desc: Organize your tasks by categories like Work, Study, Life, and Play, or sort them by time-based status such as Overdue, Reminding, and Completed to better manage your daily schedule.

discuss.title: Discuss
discuss.desc: Leave a message here to share your thoughts on ArcticAria's features and future development. In the future, you'll also be able to comment on and like posts.

items.title: Career
items.desc: Designed for project management and deep work/study. Whether you're preparing for exams or developing a new project, it helps you systematically track progress.

items.title: Life Reminder & Discover
items.desc: Created to solve the frustration of trivial, recurring tasks and to help you discover new fun things to do. A personalized inspiration library for new life experiences.

join.title: Join Us
join.summary: ArcticAria is an open-source project, and its future needs more like-minded people to build it together. If you've been troubled by the problems above, we are solving them together.
join.core_dev_desc: If you have 3+ months of development experience and are interested in our core modules, we welcome you. The core modules are technically challenging.
join.entry_dev_desc: If you're a beginner, don't worry! We have many peripheral features (like discussion likes, OAuth login, etc.) for you to practice on. It's a great learning opportunity.
